faq.question: What happens to my solar system if I sell my Granville home?
faq.answer: If you own your solar system through a loan, you have several options when selling your Granville property: pay off the remaining loan balance at closing using sale proceeds, transfer the loan obligation to the home buyer with lender approval, or include the loan payoff amount in your home's asking sale price. Research and studies consistently show that solar systems increase home values by more than the remaining loan balance, making your Granville property significantly more attractive to potential buyers. We thoroughly discuss these scenarios during your consultation.
